description: Mini sandwiches filled with shredded BBQ chicken, topped with ranch slaw and melted cheese. Easy for small hands to hold and packed with flavor.
side: Sweet potato fries and corn on the cob

description: Interactive dinner with seasoned ground turkey, warm rice, and an array of toppings including cheese, lettuce, and mild salsa. Kids can customize their bowls.

meal: Creamy Mac and Cheese with Hidden Veggies
description: Homemade macaroni and cheese sauce blended with cauliflower puree and topped with crispy breadcrumbs. Served with grilled chicken on the side.
Individual-sized meatloaves shaped like cupcakes, topped with mashed potato 'frosting' and cheese. Fun presentation kids love.
Homemade panko-crusted cod fingers with a light lemon-herb seasoning. Served with tartar sauce for dipping.
Classic spaghetti with choice of traditional beef meatballs or chicken meatballs, served with garlic bread and various sauce options.
side: Caesar salad and cheesy garlic knots

description: Ranch-seasoned chicken breasts baked with colorful vegetables on one pan. Simple, flavorful, and easy cleanup.
